SEARCH
Package danogl.components

Class ScheduledTask

java.lang.Object
danogl.components.ScheduledTask
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
public class ScheduledTask extends Object implements Component
A component for scheduling a task for execution at a later time
Author:
Dan Nirel

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ScheduledTask(GameObject gameObjectToUpdateThrough, float waitTime, boolean repeat, Runnable onElapsed)
    Create a scheduled task.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    reset()
    Reset the clock, make the task start counting time from now instead of since the call to the constructor or the last call to reset.
    void
    update(float deltaTime)
    When a GameObject is assigned this component, it calls this method in every update

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ScheduledTask

      public ScheduledTask(GameObject gameObjectToUpdateThrough, float waitTime, boolean repeat, Runnable onElapsed)
      Create a scheduled task. No other calls to the object are necessary.
      Parameters:
      gameObjectToUpdateThrough - A GameObject related to the task. It is not actually important what GameObject is supplied here. The task will become a Component of that object, as a means of calling this task's update method. If and when possible, the task will remove itself from the object's components.
      waitTime - The delay until the task is executed, in seconds. The actual time might, of course, be a little bit longer, depending on the frequency at which updates to the game are made (the FPS).
      repeat - Should the task be executed once, or every waitTime?
      onElapsed - The task to execute.

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Reset the clock, make the task start counting time from now instead of since the call to the constructor or the last call to reset.

    • update

      public void update(float deltaTime)
      Description copied from interface: Component
      When a GameObject is assigned this component, it calls this method in every update
      Specified by:
      update in interface Component
      Parameters:
      deltaTime - the time, in seconds, since the previous update
